mapper.insert: INSERT INTO channel(user_id, name, reg_date) VALUES( #{channel.userId}, #{channel.name}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE channel SET subs = subs + #{value} WHERE channel_id = #{channelId}
UPDATE channel SET video_count = video_count + #{value} WHERE channel_id = #{channelId}
mapper.select: SELECT channel_id as channelId, user_id as userId, name, description, reg_date as regDate, subs, video_count as videoCount, arts, profile FROM channel WHERE channel_id = #{channelId}
SELECT channel_id as channelId, `name`, `profile` FROM CHANNEL NATURAL JOIN subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = #{channelId};
